original: Āsavañceva sāsavañca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Āsavañceva sāsavaṁ hetuñca sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavam hetuñca sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ

original: ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā
pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Āsavañceva sāsavañca nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca na hetum dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na noāsavaḥ ca na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca
